text: "Clearest Blue" is a 2015 song by the Scottish synth-pop band Chvrches. It is the second single from their second studio album Every Open Eye which was released in 2015. ==Track listing== ==Charts== Chart (2015) Peak position UK Singles (Official Charts Company) 195 ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2015 songs Category:Chvrches songs
title: Clearest Blue
